It's been about two months, and there's no one to answer for a broken hand of a little shoe.

So far, forensic examinations have not been completed.
20 December15:48video videoComments

A Lada Granta vehicle crashed in Buzuluuk district, and people were injured

The causes of the accident are established.
20 December15:03Comments

The little renched woman hit a new year's glory.

A 6-year-old resident of Buzuluca was in a hospital bed.
20 December14:32Comments

The dispute has increased the punishment of an illegitimate drunken licha who killed two children at the wheel (18+)

Previously, a man was trying to put the blame on the boys.
20 December12:34video videoComments

In Orenbury, the yearly child was poisoned by white

Novoorska's baby was hospitalized at Orsca Hospital.
20 December11:10Comments

Novoorska was brutally treated and hid the crime weapon (18+)

The court found the man guilty, but it's hard to say the punishment.
20 December10:54Comments

In Orenburg province, two wagons were removed from the tracks and operational.

One was empty, one with grain. The investigation team and the Orenburg Transport Prosecutor went to the scene.
19 December17:41video videoComments

In Orenburg region, three furs were encountered

The accident occurred in the northern village area and was clarified in the regional MES.
19 December16:17Comments

In Orenburg district, the driver ' s case, who was asked to be answered for the fatal accident, was closed (18+)

The victim and the victim agreed to the decision.
19 December13:25Comments

The resident of the Azekeev district who had committed a fatal accident did not commute the sentence (18+)

The woman didn't have a driver's license, but her partner let her drive.
19 December12:20Comments

Destroyed three apartments: in Buguruslan, a jealous man was convicted of burning a apartment building.

It is true that a man will go to a correctional centre rather than a colony, but he will be compensated.
19 December12:05Comments

In Sol-Ilecca, a man found an artillery shell on the old ellevator.

In the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, a verification material has been collected in the Orenburg region.
19 December11:29Comments

Orsca's girl, poisoned the previous day, still in reanimation.

Fortunately, she feels much better.
19 December10:50Comments

In Orenburg, two guys had a taxi and damaged several cars.

The police are currently investigating what happened on Berezk Street.
19 December10:11Comments

Not given due attention: in Orenbourg, a migrant guest attacked the owner of the house with a fork (18+)

He hit a man in his neck three times because he allegedly acted wrong with him, a " big guest " . Fortunately, the victim survived.
19 December10:10Comments

In Orenburg, on the Sharlyk highway, the Lada driver flew into the skirt and tattered the pole.

According to the Department of Fire Safety and Civil Protection of Orenburg Region, the rescue team, together with the Regional MES, de-locked the driver of the vehicle and carried an ambulance on the stretcher.
19 December10:02Comments

The bus killed two men, causing another moral injury (18+) for the victims.

A second civil case was heard at the Dzerzin District Court of Orenburg, concerning the terrible incident of November 2022.
19 December09:55Comments

In Buzuluca, two children were poisoned with carbon dioxide

One six years, two to 12. Fortunately, they are alive.
19 December09:47Comments

In Buguruslan, a man split three ATMs.

The things he didn't use the terminals until he knew. He has already been prosecuted.
19 December09:21video videoComments

In Orsk, six people were poisoned by an unknown substance.

One of the victims is in serious condition. They were all hospitalized from the office building.
18 December17:05Comments

...further,

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
